channel.title: Execute app plugin
channel.description:
Ok, i had a question from a person on the forum i frequent, [url=http://forum.scar-scripts.com/showthread.php?p=1905#post1905]http://forum.scar-scripts.com/showthread.php?p=1905#post1905[/url]
How to make scar execute an app? Since there was no method, and would rather not delve into an api call to do it, or have the guy show a folder, and click on app with scar, I just made a quick delphi plugin and a winzip self extractor. Thought i might share it here, as maybe someone else would like to use it.
Instructions: Read the readme and follow its directions
If any one wants to scan it, go ahead. aftermath_96 told me to post it in development forum.
And if anyone wants source, ask me on msn, superstuntguy@msn.com Ill be happy to give it to you
Download link: [url=http://www.mooload.com/new/file.php?file=files/300806/1156898110/Execute+App.zip]http://www.mooload.com/new/file.php?file=files/300806/1156898110/Execute+App.zip[/url]
Ill be adding new stuff, and it would help to post a suggestion.

item.title: Execute app plugin
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

I use Ubuntu! w00t! No virus for me!

Either way, any descent member would read what they’re running first. So only leachers would get caught by that, which I dont mind!

Read full topic

item.title: Execute app plugin
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“superstuntguy, post:5, topic:11682”]Yes, that is true.
They could easily execute a ‘deltree c:/WINDOWS’.
But if you were using Linux, (and WINE), you wouldn’t have that problem, now would you?
(Unless you were running as root, coughidiotcough)[/quote]

Or you could post the source.

Read full topic

item.title: Execute app plugin
item.dc:creator: @superstuntguy superstuntguy
item.description:
@superstuntguy wrote:

Yes, that is true.
They could easily execute a ‘deltree c:/WINDOWS’.
But if you were using Linux, (and WINE), you wouldn’t have that problem, now would you?
(Unless you were running as root, coughidiotcough)

Read full topic

item.title: Execute app plugin
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Advice: Don’t use this, if this is linked into scar any script can use it to fuck up ur pc or open malicious programs, it’s just a workaround around the api calls

Read full topic

item.title: Execute app plugin
item.dc:creator: @bramble bramble
item.description:
@bramble wrote:

the link to download it is broken?

http://www.filefactory.com/file/fd1fa3/ i got it from his site and put it on another hoster.

thank you as i understand how dangerous this is, which is why i have 2 scar installs now, one with and one without as the one with i will only use for my scripts and scripts that i have edited to delete the uid from within the script

Read full topic

item.title: Execute app plugin
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

Yep, like I said already in the topic on Scar-Scripts.com forums… It works VERY WELL. <3

Thanks alot once again k1tten. I am pretty sure you get alot comments about it!

Read full topic
